metadata.title: CVE-2023-40477 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
RARLAB WinRAR Recovery Volume Improper Validation of Array Index RemoteCode Execution Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40477` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libclamunrar9 - 0.103.11-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rar package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
unrar-nonfree package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
libclamunrar package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.103.11-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
